job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: BlockFills provides technology liquidity execution and a matching engine solution to large buyers and sellers of cryptocurrencies With over 100 years of combined experience in technology trading and banking our team has leveraged that experience to provide top institutional participants access to the best OTC liquidity around the globe in all aspects of the cryptocurrency spacebrbrResponsibilitiesbrFrontend development of applications for trade monitoring and backoffice operationsbrWebbased UI development in Python and JavaScriptbrTechnical assistance with customer connectionsbrbrTechnical skills brPython required experience with Linux requiredbrTrading industry experience a plusbrUnderstanding of computer networking cloud computing AWS a plusbr4year degree requiredbrbrThis person should be detailoriented with a passion for markets and an interest in digital assets with strong communication skills and a willingness to find solutions to difficult problems in an evolving space
